name: Ideology
description:
Welcome to Ideology

Ideology is a game that pits Capitalism vs. Communism in a turn based strategy game. 

Paint the board with your ideology through the unique strategic maneuvering of your pieces. Use the tools of the Cold War to capture the board for your Ideology.


Credits

Programming: DrPasta

Art: DrPasta, Mandelyn McKracherne

Sound:

https://freesound.org/people/180118/sounds/442887/ https://freesound.org/people/bubaproducer/sounds/107154/ https://freesound.org/people/james_longley/sounds/433807/

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was submitted for the Historically Accurate Game Jam. The theme was Cold War, and Chess embodied the rivalry between the United States and the Soviet Union, so what better way to honor that theme than with a chess-like strategy game?
